DOC.brief_title: Tobacco-Related Disease Prevention Among Korean Americans
DOC.detailed_description: Smoking prevalent among Korean American men . Quitting Winning , internet-based , cognitive-behavioral smoking cessation program , develop use community-based participatory research principle . A randomized controlled trial use evaluate whether participant likely complete program quit smoke 6-month follow-up additional reinforcement include financial incentive program completion interim survey .
DOC.criteria: selfidentified Korean American ethnicity age 18 year old daily smoker ( i.e. , smoke least one cigarette per day previous seven day ) current U.S. resident valid email address regular internet access . None
